description:
Tech webbing is super-thin, super-strong webbing that has a braided polyamide sheath and a Dyneema® core. Dyneema is light material with high tensile strength, but it abrades rapidly and its slipperiness does not hold knots well. The addition of a polyamide sheath increases the stability and safety of knots and hitches.This product is sold by the metre.Dyneema core has a polyamide (nylon) sheath, kernmantle woven with the core to increase the stability of knots.Diameter is 12mm.Breaking load is 15kN.Weight of 22g/m.

        Sustainability








Bluesign











                      Certified Bluesign® Product














                      Recycled content
name: Edelrid 12mm Nylon/Dyneema Flat Tech Webbing
